sense.name: electronic equipment used for communication
sense.examples: He's got MGM on the phone right now. They are upgrading the network switches of their phone system. Can I borrow your phone to make a short call?

sense.name: informal usage for headset, or earpiece
sense.examples: When flying, Mary wears phones that cancel out noise. Each seat on the plane has its own screen and set of phones for listening to music or movies.

sense.name: a minimal unit of speech sound in a language
sense.examples: An aspirated 'p' in English is a phone that occurs in word initial position, e.g., 'pot' and 'pantry' Unaspirated 'p' in English occurs after another consonant, e.g, 'spot' and 'spout'. Speakers of a language are usually not aware of all the phones they use when speaking.
